page.title: 16The Fish Farm 2
page.content: There are a few predators and they are the cormorant,the seal,the heron and the poachers.The cormorant can't get any of the fish because there are nets over the tanks but they can damage them.If the seal is really hungry it will attack the cages and eat a fish and the rest of the fish will get away.The heron will sit peacefully and wait till he sees his chance.The poachers only come out at night because it is dark and nobody can see them.There is an alarm system on the cages but no one has tried to get in yet. It is very important to watch out for disease so the tanks in the hatchery have to be cleaned out every day. Sometimes the fish have to be vaccinated.When the fish are two years old or about 3 to 4 kilos in weight they are sold.
